title: Analysts See Upto 70% Rally On This Rakesh Jhunjhunwala Portfolio Tech Stock | Mint - Mint
content: Analysts See Upto 70% Rally On This Rakesh Jhunjhunwala Portfolio Tech Stock | Mint  Mint
description: Indian ace investor Rakesh Jhunjhunwala owns 10.10% stake in the gaming tech company as of March 2022
